sentences.en: After his wife’s death he became more and more withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 妻子去世后，他变得越来越自闭。

sentences.en: He became very withdrawn and broody.
He's been very quiet and withdrawn, sort of different, somehow.
sentences.cn: 不知什么缘故，他最近十分沉默，有点异样。

sentences.en: If fighting worsens, the troops might be reinforced, or ingloriously withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 如果战势恶化，军队可能得到增援，或不光彩地撤退。

sentences.en: Interest earned on the account is not taxed until withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 这些钱产生的利息在提取之前不必纳税.
马克沉默寡言，难以管束。

sentences.en: Only a small fraction of a bank's total deposits will be withdrawn at any one time.
sentences.cn: 任何时候，一家银行的总存款只有少量会被提取。

sentences.en: Our force has been withdrawn from the danger area.
sentences.cn: 我们的军队已从危险地区撤出.

sentences.en: Our forces have been withdrawn from the danger area.
sentences.cn: 我们的部队已经撤出危险地带.

sentences.en: The book was withdrawn for the offending passages to be deleted.
sentences.cn: 这本书因含有需要删除的问题章节而被撤回。
警卫部队被立即撤了回来.

sentences.en: The troops are being gradually withdrawn.
They could have withdrawn into the mountain fastness of Eryri.
sentences.cn: 他们本可退到山中要塞埃利里去。

sentences.en: They have withdrawn to a safer area.
sentences.cn: 他们已经撤退到更为安全的地带.

sentences.en: We have been withdrawn from the danger area.
sentences.cn: 我们已经撤离危险地带.

words.tran_cn: 可抽出的；可更换的；可拆卸的；能够提取的
撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
偏僻的；沉默寡言的；孤独的

trans.tran_en: very shy and quiet, and concerned only about your own thoughts

trans.tran_cn: 取回，收回( withdraw的过去分词)
